text:
Marcus Belgrave (June 12, 1936 – May 24, 2015) was an American jazz trumpet player. He was born in Chester, Pennsylvania, but raised in Detroit, Michigan. He recorded with a variety of famous musicians, bandleaders, and record labels since the 1950s.
Belgrave died on May 24, 2015, in Ann Arbor, Michigan of heart failure, aged 78.
